name: Absolute Adoration
description:
• Two amazing friends
  • Two days (Full-release will have 6 or so)
  • A cute boy who can’t wait to meet you ❤︎

Note: Some backgrounds only have sketch/line-art and base colors. These are placeholders and will be finished later :)

Your Choices Matter....
  • This game will be choice-heavy.
  • Your choices will affect and customize your gameplay
  • Keep in mind, not all choices have immediate consequences. Some choices will weigh more heavily than others.
ATTENTION!

Hey, you!

I want you to enjoy the game, but in order for that to happen I need to give you some warnings first.

DEMO  CLICK TO SEE WARNINGS
  • Unsettling whispering
  • Small jump-scare/sudden noise
  • Shaking screen
  • Emotional abuse (manipulation)
  • Stalking

(The appearance of these will depend on the choices you make)

FULL GAME  CLICK TO SEE WARNINGS
  • Kidnapping
  • Physical violence
  • Drugging
  • Depictions of death
  • Quick-time reaction choices

(The appearance of these will depend on the choices you make)

These warnings may change as the game is updated, so please read through them to see if this is a game for you. Play responsibly.

Moving Forward

I am a solo-developer who has never made a game before this, so progress on this game will be a bit slow sometimes. I hope you can understand :)

Some features to come:
  • Several more days
  • Finished backgrounds
  • Multiple endings (at least 3)
  • Some CGs :O?
